projects.name: Job Costing Dashboard
projects.description: Labour & materials tracking with SAGE 50 integration. Compares budgeted vs actual costs, tracks GP margins, and monitors budget consumption across all active jobs.

milestones.text: Upload current project data ‚Äî 30% of jobs uploaded
Box integration ‚Äî automated SAGE CSV sync

projects.name: Estimator App
projects.description: Generator enclosure quoting tool ‚Äî reimplements PE's master Excel estimating logic into a web app. Still in early prototyping and testing ‚Äî not producing accurate estimates yet. Foundational data architecture and tooling in place, but calculation accuracy needs significant work across all enclosure types and kW ratings.

milestones.text: Validate estimation engine against real quotes ‚Äî prototyping, not accurate yet
Labour hour calibration across all enclosure types
Detailed project archive database ‚Äî historical quotes & completed jobs
AI integration ‚Äî match current RFQs against historical projects for quick estimating
Estimating knowledge base ‚Äî guided workflow for non-technical users

projects.name: Project Management App
projects.description: Internal project management tool for Pacific Enclosures. Scope and requirements to be defined.

projects.name: Purchasing App
projects.description: Purchasing and procurement tool for Pacific Enclosures. Scope and requirements to be defined.

timeline.title: Job Costing ‚Äî 30% of Jobs Uploaded
timeline.desc: Uploaded 30% of current project data to the Job Costing Dashboard.

timeline.title: Estimator Calibration Milestone
timeline.desc: 500kW DFEK Seattle benchmark fully calibrated ‚Äî design specs exact, finishing materials -0.00%, labour hours exact match across all categories. Genset install materials +3.35%.

timeline.title: Estimator Data Architecture Built
timeline.desc: 13 JSON lookup tables created (clearances, door rules, enclosure sizing, labor rates, materials, pricing, shipping, silencer sizing, sound levels). Full data-driven configuration.

timeline.title: Test Suite & Reference Benchmarks
timeline.desc: Automated accuracy test suite built. 3 reference estimate benchmarks structured: 150kW BC Hydro, 300kW Princeton RCMP, 500kW DFEK Seattle.

timeline.title: RFP Parser & Repo Restructure
timeline.desc: RFP parser with batch processing built. Full repo restructured with clean organization, CLAUDE.md documentation, and archived old analysis files.

timeline.title: PM Dashboard Created
timeline.desc: Standalone project management dashboard for tracking all PE development work.

timeline.title: Box Integration Planned
timeline.desc: Automated SAGE 50 CSV sync via Box API ‚Äî eliminate manual uploads by watching for new SAGE exports in Box.

timeline.title: Job Costing v1.0 Deployed
timeline.desc: Full dashboard with SAGE parsing, budget uploads, variance analysis, and portfolio overview live on Heroku.

timeline.title: Heroku Runtime Fix
timeline.desc: Fixed Python runtime version to 3.11.11 for stable deployment.

timeline.title: Estimator Demo Sandbox Built
timeline.desc: Initial demo sandbox created ‚Äî not yet functional. Estimation engine, genset DB, and UI scaffolded but requires extensive testing and validation.

timeline.title: Estimator Excel Logic Documented
timeline.desc: Analyzed 3,842 Excel formulas from master estimating spreadsheet and documented complete logic.
